name: Church of God Worship Center
description: Church of God Worship Center provides spiritual services, community support, and religious guidance to the Manchester area. Led by Pastors Brad & Candon Stevens, the church offers worship services, prayer support, and community outreach programs.
source: Verified from Google search results, Facebook page, and multiple business directories
hours_of_operation: Services typically held on Sundays and Wednesdays
populations_served: General community, families, individuals seeking spiritual guidance
notes: VERIFIED INFORMATION: All contact information verified on 2024-01-15. CITATIONS: Contact information verified from Google search results showing (606) 599-9832 phone number.
